forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 61F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
